Class ScoreBoard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am38.Model.ScoreBoard
public class ScoreBoard extends Object
Class dedicated to saving the score of every Player

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ScoreBoard()
    Constructor of this class, sets all player's scores to 0 since it'll be created at the start of a Game

      public int getScore(Color color)

      Returns:
      int representing the score

    • addToPlayerScore

      public void addToPlayerScore(Color color, int numOfPoints)
      Updates the score of the Player, which color is given as an argument of this method
      Parameters:
      color - color of the Player who scored this points
      numOfPoints - number of points that needs to be added to the Player's score

    • getPlayersScores

      public Map<Color,Integer> getPlayersScores()
      Getter for the playerScores attribute
      Returns:
      the map of scores, which key is the Color of the player who owns those points
